summary: This is a remodelled version of a weapon from Witcher 3: Wild Hunt game by CD Projekt Red.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][size=3][center]Zireael Sword Remodelled - Modder's Resource for Skyrim.[/center][/size][/color]

This resource mod contains a totally reworked model, based on the original Ciri's sword model from Witcher 3: Wild Hunt game by CD Projekt Red. Model is fully SSE-compatible.
For observation purposes it contains an ESP-file, which adds the sword that can be finded in a chest that is placed on one of the walkway platforms right in front of the Whiterun city gates. Technically it's the improved version of the standard Silver sword and can be improved with a Silver ingot.

***

[color=#ffff00]Author[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures.

[color=#ffff00]Special thanks to[/color]:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6511435/]dajost32[/url] for inspiring me to make this weapon recreation, and for uploading [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/48005/]Oblivion version of this mod[/url].
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/xuniana]Xuniana[/url] and Moogleoutfitters for providing original ported model as a template.
CD Projekt Red for creating a wonderful game.

***

[color=#ffff00]Also:[/color]
Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].
Or join me on my [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/RonnieMagnumModsAndOther/]Facebook group[/url] to be updated about my upcoming mods.
author: Ronnie Magnum
